Paragraph: In short , AFM results confirm that the PffBB-14:PC71BM blend layer exhibited a desirable morphology for efficient photovoltaic properties.

| --- |

| PC71BM |

The two "Material Name" entities identified in the paragraph are "PffBB-14" and "PC71BM". These are the materials that make up the blend layer in the photovoltaic device being discussed.
